Antioch.Pittsburg Center station: Pittsburg Center, also referred to as Railroad Avenue or simply Pittsburg, is a future Bay Area Rapid Transit station on the planned eBART light rail line. It will be located at the Railroad Avenue overpass of Highway 4 in Pittsburg, California. Funding for the station was secured in early 2015; construction commenced on July 27, 2015, with an expected opening date with the rest of the eBART line in 2018.
